mapper.insert: insert into operation_log(operation_log_name, operation_log_path, operation_log_minio_path, operation_log_type, operation_log_file_type, user_id, file_info_id) values (#{operationLogName}, #{operationLogPath}, #{operationLogMinioPath}, #{operationLogType}, #{operationLogFileType}, #{userId}, #{fileInfoId})
